title: Mauro Cabeção
text: Mauro de Campos Júnior (23 April 1955 – 6 August 2004), known as Mauro Cabeção, is a Brazilian former <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who played as a <a href="defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>. He competed in the <a href="Football%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics">men's tournament</a> at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>.
